amendment.description: An amendment numbered 25 printed in House Report 119-232 to eliminate funding for ARPA-E and transfers funds to the SRA.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Advanced Research Projects Agency-Energy by $350 million and to increase the Spending Reduction Account by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 77 - 347 (Roll no. 229).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 77 - 347 (Roll no. 229).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
